title: Need Help designing photomat font
content:
I need help in having 2 fonts replicated from a photomat cutting machine. I am unable to export the font from the machine. I'll need only capital letters, numbers, and a few punctuation marks. The fonts will need to be in .ttf file format. Please contact me if you have interest in creating this font. Example attached.

Thanks  
Scott
